page.title: 08Alstonefield Farming
page.content: {Alstonefield Livestock} In Alstonefield there are just livestock farms that keep sheep and various breeds of cattle - beef and dairy. There is one farmer who keeps pigs for Paul's Feed, a company that sells sheep corn, cow corn and pig corn. The owner of the farm will get a profit out of the total that the pigs make. There is a donkey farmer who keeps all types. He used to keep mules and ponies but he has sold them all. {Farm Machinery} There are not many farms that have important machinery like forage harvester, balers and round-balers, because there are contractors who have these implements. So, most people hire contractors to do their harvesting of the grass.
